title: Trump Picks Longtime Lawyer for Russia Investigation (Audio)
itunes:title: Trump Picks Longtime Lawyer for Russia Investigation (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bob Van Voris, a legal reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses the selection of Marc Kasowitz as President Trump's attorney in the investigation into Russian interference in the U.S. election. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
